Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Jar
Description: Jar with a round base, biconical body and a tall wide neck. The exterior surface bears a red-orange slip on the neck and a brown-red one on the body and the base. The  upper section of the body is decorated with horizontal lines, in the colours black, white or orange.
